column1: Kata Robata////The decor is fairly stylish and modern
column2: though not very memorable.  It is indeed loud inside
column3: and not terribly intimate.  I was very unimpressed with our server.  He was young and clearly inexperienced - both with this restaurant and with waiting tables in general.  He knew little about the food
column5: and visited us at odd intervals that did not correspond with our needs.  AFTER we ordered our 2nd bottle of sake
column6: which he could tell us nothing about
column7: the bartender/somellier visited us and suggested we order the sake flights next time to taste some high-end sakes at a low price.
